UserManagerView

this view represents the user manager Inherits from:

  • <Ext.grid.GridPanel>
Summary
UserManagerViewthis view represents the user manager Inherits from:
Properties
id{string} id of user manager
border{boolean} If set to true, a border is drawn.
textId{string} string
textName{string} column name for username
textPassword{string} column name for password
textRole{string} column name for role
tooltipDelete{string} tooltip for delete button
textDelete{string} label for delete button
tooltipSave{string} tooltip for save button
textSave{string} label for save button
tooltipCancel{string} tooltip for cancel button
textCancel{string} label for cancel button
textAddUser{string} label for add user button
textAddUserTitle{string} title for the window add user
tooltipAddUser{string} tooltip for add user button
textTitle{string} window title
tooltipSearch{string} tooltip for search button
textSelectRole{string} default for combo box
url{string} base url for user geostore services
auth{string} auth token to access geostore services
